about_the_game:
Your boyfriend wants to become a completely ordinary person instead of being himself — will this need to be tolerated by society prevail? A retro-styled intimate queer story about self-discovery, acceptance of being transgender, and trust.

FEATURES:

  • Your boyfriend reacts when you pat him on the head — truly an example of interactive fiction!

  • Five possible endings — in a relationship, communication is key!

  • ~7000 words of a story about love, identities, and introspection. Help your partner deal with societal expectations and build a stable relationship.

  • Retro style with modern conveniences! Connect a gamepad, enable a dyslexic-friendly font or choose the art style you prefer to have the best time possible.

  • The immersive sound design allows you to fully enjoy the experience of disagreeing with your partner.

  • You can wishlist Bonjin ~ An Ordinary Man at any moment — perhaps even right now?

short_description: When your beloved wants to abandon his personality and become an absolutely ordinary person, what do you do? Bonjin ~ An Ordinary Man is an intimate young adult story about transgender identity, exploration of masculinity, and mutual understanding.
